message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $12,000 by you. To start our negotiation, I propose a price of $11,000 for this exceptional item.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  $11,000 is a good starting point, but I'm hoping to get closer to my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Let's see if we can find a price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet within your budget. In response, I would like to counter with a price of $10,800 for the product. This price reflects the value of the item while also considering your budget constraints.
